FuncDef:
The radius-server alarm disable command disables a device from generating a RADIUS server down alarm when the communication between a device and a RADIUS server in a RADIUS server group is interrupted.
The undo radius-server alarm disable command restores the default configuration.
By default, when the communication between a device and a RADIUS server in a RADIUS server group is interrupted, the device generates a RADIUS server down alarm.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If the RADIUS server status change in a RADIUS server group does not need to be concerned and the device is not expected to generate an alarm indicating a RADIUS server status change, run the radius-server alarm disable command to disable the device from generating the RADIUS server down alarm.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
